name: Untitled Fox Game Demo
description:
One-level demo for a Vertically Ascending platformer I'm working on. I originally wasn't planning on releasing a demo but some people were wanting to try it out so eh

Everything in this game is subject to change.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Moving around the menu and character.

Space / Enter / Z - Selecting on the menu and jumping.

Escape - Return to title screen.

R - Restart level.
